creator: SCARLETOAK TECHNOLOGIES LLP
descriptionHtml:
Control your phone usage, earn coins and redeem coupons. It is that simple!

SCREEN-ADDICTION|PHONE ADDICTION|APP BLOCK|DIGITAL DETOX|DISTRACTION BLOCK|FOCUS MODE|PRODUCTIVITY|PHUBBING

*Get your regular usage analytics at one go
* Make progress by reducing usage till you reach happy zone
* 1 minute reduced = 1 coin earned
* Weekly Bonus coins and exclusive offers once you reach achievers club
* Enable cash withdrawal options by making strong progress


Home

The home page is where the synopsis of all your progress is. It shows you key data points like
^ Daily average screen time,
^ Most used apps
^ Tools to reduce usage
^ Best of deals in the store
^ Coin tally and gains
^Tips and guidelines to help you stay on top

Coupon store

^ Cool offers from partner brands
^ Redeem with coins earned and avail offer
^ Subject to T&C
^ Coins tally
^Reward history

Activities and contests

^ Complete app breaks and earns more coins
^ Phone detox
^ APP-BLOCKING FEATURE will be updated in subsequent versions



Invite & Earn
To make your phone-life balance journey more interesting and rewarding, you can invite all your friends and family to Offline! The more the merrier!

What’s next?

Stay tuned for more exciting features, exclusive brand deals, and bumper prizes for contest winners

So what are you waiting for? Let's live. love.offline

descriptionShort: Track your phone usage time,reduce and earn rewards.It pays to stay focused!
title: Offline

creator: SCARLETOAK TECHNOLOGIES LLP
descriptionHtml:
Reduce your phone usage one day at a time and build sustainable wellbeing habits.

SCREEN-ADDICTION|PHONE ADDICTION|APP BLOCK|APP DETOX|DISTRACTION BLOCK|FOCUS MODE|PRODUCTIVITY|HABIT CHANGE

*Frictionless onboarding
* Daily curated Mini tasks up to 7 days , making habit change easy and fun
* Rewards for successful completion of tasks at the end of 7 day journey
* Guided Activities to de-stress from excess screen time whenever you want , wherever you can
* Customise your distraction bucket and block unwanted apps
* Journal your thoughts and receive daily tips to keep you motivated
7-day program :
^ Pick one app that distracts you the most
^ Complete daily mini-tasks and take it one day at a time
^ Reduce the app usage upto 4 times since inception
^ Rewards for completion
^ Access to customised distraction bucket ,usage statistics ,coupons and guided activities after day 8

Offline recommended tasks :

^ De-stress at any time of the day with mini activities that help you calm down and be mindful
^ Easy to do stretches and yoga for neck and eye strain due to long hours before screens
^ Tips and guidelines to keep you in track



Go-Offline together :
To make your phone-life balance journey more interesting and fun, you can invite all your friends and family to Offline! The more the merrier!

What’s next?

Stay tuned for more exciting features, exclusive brand deals, and personalized journeys !

So what are you waiting for? Let's live. love.offline
